name: Magicbag-AMotiongame
0:
”Alexa, open magic bag”
”Alexa, launch magic bag”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic bag
des: Magic bag is a funny motion game for children. The kids have to run around during the drum roll. When Alexa says Stop, the kids have to curl up into a ball. Alexa then enchants the kids into different animals.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
